_design_notes.project_name: Dead Don't Talk (Junior High 2000 Words Ver.)
_design_notes.difficulty_focus: Abstract Concepts, Social Issues, Advanced Verbs, Adjectives

word_selection_rules.source: 教育部國中參考字彙表 (2000字)
exclude: Common monosyllabic words (e.g., buy, pay, eat)
Words with weak vowel sounds that are hard to detect
Pure numbers (e.g., three, fifty, ten) - STT often converts these to digits (3, 50, 10) causing match failures

sentence_writing_rules.formatting: Sentence Case (Sentences MUST start with a Capital Letter)
sentence_writing_rules.note: Sentences should reflect social interactions or describe abstract situations without inducing digit output.
